participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Dedicated and caring, Jake has a strong sense of responsibility, particularly when it comes to family and pets.
participant_1.background: my cats are very special to me. my dad taught me everything i know. i enjoy building houses. i am a construction worker.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and optimistic, Emily loves exploring nature and is enthusiastic about new experiences.
participant_2.background: i've a pet fish. my favorite color is orange. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i turned 18 years old yesterday. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago.

content.text: I am sure your parents would love me. Do you enjoy building houses?
